page.title: 06LOCAL HOUSING
page.content: {LOCAL HOUSING-(ONE). IN CEFN MEIRIADOG(MARLI),THERE IS A GROUP OF COUNCIL HOUSES CALLED "CAE ONNEN".THEY RECEIVED THEIR NAME BECAUSE THERE WAS A THICKET OF ASH TREES THERE.THE HOUSES ARE ABOUT 45 YEARS OLD,AND CONTRAST TO THE NEWER HOUSES ACROSS THE ROAD.IN 1981 MY FATHER COMPLETED THE BUILDING OF MY NEW HOME.AT ONE TIME,THERE WAS AN ITALIAN WHO LIVED NEARBY AND ON OUR LAND KEPT HIS PIGS.EVIDENCE OF THE PIG STIES CAN BE SEEN IN THE PILES OF CONCRETE RUBBLE REMAINING IN ONE CORNER OF THE FIELD.IN 1870 THE GLASCOED WATERWORKS RESERVOIR WAS BUILT BUT THE FIRST FILTER STATION WAS BUILT IN 1929 AND THE EXTENDED BUILDING IN 1939.
